I have the following Tobacco cards for sale:

T202 Hassan Tpl. Folder W. Dahlen / Zach Wheat HOF Wheat Strikes Out PSA 1 (mk) SOLD very nice for grade, small pencil mark on border. back is legible, no paper loss.

T201 Mecca Dbl. Folders Brown HOF / Hoffman BVG 3.5 $72 Wonderful card, no problems, could've graded higher.

Both cards would make great additions to any collection.
